body: Hopefully this makes it clearer but there are two results files and 8 points however the component only collects the illuminance results for four points[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3WL4yNYnOoaaxlW765IHcTnWmHbT47mUgC84onSZZlPkQW*7qwQQ*CseiAQXLDqe6QNl1lG6CiBv9rr-ISpzkk3euRATKSQu/AnnualSimulation2.png)
